website_summaries.verdict: This is a good choice for those who have a lot of devices that they need to charge and not enough outlets.
pros: Contains 2 USB charge ports and 2 traditional power outlets for charging other devices
Easy to set up and change alarms
cons: The speaker quality on this alarm clock isn't as good as it could be
You can only set 1 alarm at a time

customer_reviews.title: These are great! We use two in our rental beach condo
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We use two in our rental beach condo. Get the black ones. I bought the white ones first. The white ones are pretty and work well but the backlight for the display they use on the white units is way too bright on it's lowest setting. The black unit's displays are much better and dim to a level where you don't notice them and can still easily read the time in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: - Easy to use controls - Lots of power ports - ...
customer_reviews.text: PRO's: - Easy to use controls - Lots of power ports - One giant button on top controls pretty much all functions. - Backup battery to help keep correct time when power fails. - Very Simple to Use. CON's: - Speaker quality is of poor quality ... (especially considering the price) - Bluetooth will not automatically connect ... (must manually connect it through your Bluetooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a hotel I was staying in. literally bought it here on amazon within the first 15 minutes of being in the room. I now have it on my night stand at home. Bluetooth speakers sound great. its got some weight to it, and has a thick heavy duty power cord, which really speaks to the quality of this little guy. the usb ports are high power and will charge your device as fast as it can take it. love this. would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: supergankx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these in November/December 2016. They are great for charging multiple things at once. The alarm is easy to use. You can only set one alarm at a time. And using bluetooth is simple. Great product. I actually saw this in a hotel and searched until I could find one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Alarm reverts to 6:00am--really awful feature--returned it immediately
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the dumbest feature I've seen on an alarm clock. Every time you turn it off, the alarm reverts back to 6:00am...you have to reset it every day, or more often if you accidentally turn it off. Plus, you have to hold down and turn the dial at the same time to set the alarm. If your hand slips, it goes back to 6:00am AGAIN and you have to do it all over. It's really stupid--I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: NYCMom

customer_reviews.title: Obeys the law of gravity - clunky but it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, the Cubie Blue meets expectations. Time is easy to read and I like that it can be dimmed. It's convenient to be able to charge devices with the USB charging ports. Once learned, the time-setting avoids the endless punching of buttons common on many digital clocks. BUT, this item is really clunky. It is heavy, hence the review title. The cord is heavy and stiff, making it hard to orient on a bedside table. The plug is unusually large and blocks some nearby outlets. Oh, did I say: pricey? It is.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: Best bedside clock ever!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem displayed the correct time as soon as I plugged it in - how I have no idea, but I was impressed! Ridiculously easy to set the alarm & use. Bluetooth pairing was just as easy and the speaker sounds really good for such a small device. Switches under the battery door to select alarm function (daily repeat or not) and another switch for easy daylight savings time change setting. This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio/clock. Easy to set up and manage
customer_reviews.text: Great radio/clock. Easy to set up and manage. Good sound however the type of Bluetooth it has you have to connect it manually every time you turn it on. Even very cheap 10$ devices I have connect automatically. I would have gave 4 stars but the whole reason I purchased it was because of the Bluetooth feature and the price is pretty heafty for it not to connect automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Seabea2013

customer_reviews.title: The charging ports are a great feature and also like how you can dim the ...
customer_reviews.text: I first used this product on vacation in a hotel and had to have it!! The charging ports are a great feature and also like how you can dim the clock. Hidden features for daylight savings and default alarm to daily is located in the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: My speaker broke in less than 6 months of using
customer_reviews.text: After less than a half year of using it (never dropped, spilled water or damaged in any way) the sound started glitchin. At first I thought it was because of my phones Bluetooth but then I started using it with my laptop (to avoid annoying sound cutting) and the problem appeared again. It only works for 5-10 mins and then it’s impossible to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement, get with technology!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for your current bedside clock. You or your partner wont have to fight over who charges their phone, watch, or tablet, anything that needs charging. Has both ac and usb, alarm features, dim features, and connects bluetooth very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Champion808

customer_reviews.title: How the hell do I set this brick up.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that the morons designing and selling this product provided no user information in the package. No not inadequate information, no user information, 0 user info, nothing in the box that even remotely gave a hint as to how to use this turkey. Yes there is some minimal drivel on the bottom of the unit, thanks for that. Go to the web site and you can print off 15 pages of the user manual, again thanks. What the frick were the boys and girls in Richardson, Texas thinking. Get a grip and send me a I'm a moron and sorry message.
customer_reviews.author: John Bily

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for....
customer_reviews.text: This little charging dock/clock has everything one could want for a nightstand. Like many, I saw it at a hotel. It charged my phone quickly, and the multi dimmer readout was useful. The bluetooth speaker has a good sound to it. I love that the time sets itself! So happy to have found this after searching for so long. Yes, it has a heavy cord as some reviews mention, but so what? It looks as though another plug can piggyback into it. Possibly for a lamp. Definately would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose...excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: While staying at the La Quinta Inn in Downtown Chicago (The Loop) they had this clock in the room. I fell in love at first sight. When I returned home I ordered one. The number of USB ports and plug-ins made this a gem for my nightstand at home. This is pricy for an alarm clock, but it actually comes with so much convenience that it was worth every penny to me. The only downside is having to reset the alarm EVERYDAY!
customer_reviews.author: Black Dove

customer_reviews.title: Lose 3 minutes per day
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April of 2017 so now out of warranty and can't return. The clock loses 18 minutes per week and no way to calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT KEEP GPS TIME ACCURATELY
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WILL NOT UPDATE AND WILL NOT KEEP ACCURATE TIME LOSES 1 MINUTE EVERY MONTH AND WILL NOT RECOVER OR RESET TO PROPER TIME . NOT PROGRAMMABLE TIME IS SET BY OUTDATED GPS
customer_reviews.author: PBH317

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this little guy.
customer_reviews.text: I first used this product at a hotel resort. I loved it so much I ordered one before I left the resort. The product has great sound for a small cube. I really love that I can dim out the clock light to black but that when it alarms it lights back up. The alarm comes preset for 6 a.m. but that feature can be turned off when you add the batteries. There is a switch under the battery cover where you also set time zone. It has 2 USB change ports and 2 three prong plugs giving a lot of space for charging other devices. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gerber

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I stayed in a hotel that had one of these in the room. After that, I HAD TO HAVE ONE!!! I have had this for a while, and love it! I use it at home and also take it with me when I travel. Love having the charger and plugs at bedstand level. Quality item. Works great. Speaker is nice to have and sounds pretty good, but the charge capabilities are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Heysek

customer_reviews.title: it has the easily accessible USB ports and outlets at the top
customer_reviews.text: This clock is exactly what I expected it to be, based on product description and prior reviews. It's not the most aesthetically pleasing piece but it has a small footprint on the nightstand, and most importantly for me, it has the easily accessible USB ports and outlets at the top. I keep both my phone and tablet at bedside and I'm now able to charge both easily--I got rid of the power strip on the wall. I also like the Bluetooth speaker feature, as I listen to music or news via the phone with much more clarity now.Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Visually appealing, intuitive to use, and dependable. I got product mainly because my old alarm clock was hard to read during the night, and I use bluetooth speakers to play audiobooks with my son at night. My favorite features by far, though, have been the outlets. We have an older house, and the outlets are awkwardly positioned and loose. Now, I can plug in my laptop and cell phone at night without crawling out of bed. My problem now is that I have so many cords coming out of this thing that it can be hard to read the time through everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Saw this in an upmarket hotel and wanted one. Morphed an old iPhone into an IPod and USB'd it permanently to the Cubie. Then paired the two units via Bluetooth for Pandora at bedside when I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefcaprice

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually saw and used this in a hotel several months ago. Incredibly handy. Liked it so much I had to buy it. One for me, one for my daughter. Glad I did. It has two USB ports and two electrical outlet plugs on top. It also comes with a heavy duty wall plug, so no worries. I’ve since stayed in hotels without a CubieBlue, and it was terribly disappointing to have to track down charging ports. And Bluetooth to play the tunes! Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: P. Burr

customer_reviews.title: CubieBlue is Great as is Cubietime
customer_reviews.text: Great little Bluetooth Speaker Box with alarm, 117vac duplex outlets, and two USB power ports which will each charge an iPad. Volume is a tad weak. Important - The black model has the best clock face illumination range (not too bright and good for bedrooms, etc.). The white model has a very bright clock face and is ideal for well lit rooms. Same comment applies for the Cubietime (w/o Bluetooth) models. I’m well pleased with the units that I’ve purchased for home use - these little guys are really for hotel use.
customer_reviews.author: DR C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used many bedside alarm clocks, and for the first time, I found this quality product which is so user friendly. I love that , one button is used for all functions. Very easy to use. Very good construction. My only minor gripe is that electric outlets are on the top! Which is awkward to use. Would love it more, if the outlets are located on the back or on the side.
customer_reviews.author: A. Qadir

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these in a Hilton hotel room when we traveled recently and just had to order one. Sturdy, handsome design, looks great on my night stand. Extremely convenient plug ins and charging station, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Campfield

customer_reviews.title: Designed Well - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Compact and convenient to charge. The bluetooth speaker is average but it is a bedside function that is adequate. The alarm setting is easy and works great. Super design elements.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for rentals or home
customer_reviews.text: We have a rental property and saw this at a hotel we stayed at in Seattle recently. We bought the Bluetooth model so our guests can play their music at the bedside. Easy to use and solid as a rock. It has a heavy power cord and comes with a u shaped bracket to hold it to the nightstand. This hopefully will prevent someone from deciding to walk off with it. Great sound and real easy to link up to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Slympicins

customer_reviews.title: Solid clock/charger for nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for something like this for several months. Clock readout not too bright at night when you want room dark. Charges several items at once and charges well. Unit is solid and doesn’t want to slide off nightstand at light pull of a charging cord like some others do. Very good quality for price. Would definitely buy again. Don’t really use it as speaker for music so can’t comment on sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: midwestfamily

customer_reviews.title: It’s made very well! It doesn’t feel like a cheap electronic device at all!
customer_reviews.text: I had checked into a very nice Hotel in Cleveland. They had this Cube in my room. I loved it immediately. Plenty of USB ports for phone, iPad etc. it even has two electric outlets on the top which is great because I carry a small electric fan with me when I travel! So, I had to buy one for my own personal use! Bluetooth works great and the speaker is plenty loud enough to listen to music! I’ve seen some bad reviews because of the Bluetooth, if you’re looking for some high end stereo system, look for that! This sounds just fine! Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: hb88

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect, Functional Alarm Clock
customer_reviews.text: The perfect device if you need a clock that can charge two phones, function as a power strip equipped with a socket on the wall plug and two on the top, AND provide sound quality through its speaker! I learned about this clock that was in a hotel in South Lake Tahoe. I liked it so much that I ordered one. I’m glad I did. Also, it weighs enough to stay in place when other devices are plugged into it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Very Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Great multi function clock and speaker
customer_reviews.text: I recently stumbled upon this while on vacation with my boyfriend. It was in our hotel room and he had his phone synched to it each night and I appreciate that it has power outlets for charging other devices, which was a boon for us since the other socket in the hotel room had the coffee maker plugged in. Bought as a gift and So far, no regrets. I would recommend this for the gadget lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Lawliet Ryuzaki

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after seeing one in a hotel. I suppose if I’d researched more I would’ve found out it doesn’t do much. You can’t change the alarm tone to something more pleasant, you have to reset the alarm DAILY. Turns out this is just a very fancy usb outlet.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: This is FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. 2 USB Ports and 2 standard plugs on top really make the difference. One of those things you didn't even think you needed and now can't live without. BlueTooth syncs easily. Sounds great. Dims completely dark at night if desired. Easy to use. I don't have a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great product - super convenient and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for Christmas since he saw the same model in a hotel room and loved it. Also bough my husband the one without the music feature and it works great, alarm is very reliable and so convenient to have the power and USB outlets on top for extra charging.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Can charge devices at my bedside in the evening
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality with several spots for charging devices. Sound quality is fine for my needs as I don't use the bluetooth to connect to my iPhone too often. Couldn't give it 5 stars because alarm has to be set daily. Overall, I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I saw it at a hotel and fell in love with it because is so useful so I can charge my phone, iPad and others and having a speaker at the same time. I looked for it on Amazon an i thought the Price was reasonable. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: This item is excellent for the clock/alarm and for all the outlets
customer_reviews.text: This item is excellent for the clock/alarm and for all the outlets. Very sturdy. The booth tooth works very well and easy to use. The only downfall is the speaker is very weak. Not loud enough. I'm happy with my purchase just would have preferred a little louder speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't be without this!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these in our hotel room and loved it. Grandson asked for one as part of his graduation gift. I may get more for my 3 graduating relatives this year. It is awesome! We also keep it by the chair and connect it to the TV volume via bluetooth. Kids listen to their phone music with it the same way. Alarm is super easy to set too.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made. Buy the black one
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the black after returning the white version due to its bright backlight. Love that it is basically a power strip to plug in whatever you need by your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Momma JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Glorified USB Charger, not much more
customer_reviews.text: The USB charging ports and 110v outlets are the best features. However, the sound quality stinks. We’ve actually quit using the Bluetooth audio and replaced it with a JBL Flip speaker- powered from one of the USB jacks. For us, its a glorified USB charger. When planned obsolescence reaches it, and it fails at what little it does well, I’ll replace it with a charging cube and stand alone Bluetooth speaker, at a significantly lower cost- and better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is extremely easy to set
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased one for each room in my house. Extremely high quality and convenient having extra USB ports and electrical sockets. You have to reset the alarm each morning. This alarm is made for hotels so the daily setting is so that guests don't check out and forget to cut the alarm off. The alarm is extremely easy to set. I like everything about this product.
customer_reviews.author: MsPebbles

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, Well made, and you can completely turn off the display light
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite alarm clock. It's simple. It charges electronics, wakes you up, and can play music via Bluetooth. What else do you need an alarm clock to do for you? You can also completely turn off the time display if you like a very dark room.
customer_reviews.author: JD43

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock with TWO USB charging outlets!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest alarm clock ever! Charges TWO USB items and has a full dim setting to block out the light. Was introduced to this item while traveling across country in a hotel room and bought TWO as soon as we arrived in our new home. Alarm is just annoying enough to wake, has snooze which never gets used in our home---your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have radio. I thought it did.
customer_reviews.text: I sm OK with the product, but mystified as to why I have to pay $5.99 to print a label and return anything. Yet, if there is a UPS store close, you can drop it off and have it packaged and returned for free. Something is not right about this picture!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. There are multiple reports here that the clock continues to lose time everyday. I wish I had read those reports before I bought one. You have to reset the time every week.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after we saw it in a hotel room. My husband loves it, and it takes it with him when he travels. The sound quality is decent and it doesn't take up too much space. We were able to eliminate all of the power strips, sound bar, clock, etc that we had as individual pieces on the nightstand. Now, this device has it all-in-one and helped get rid of some of the clutter.
customer_reviews.author: K Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this clock is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this alarm clock with USB ports and electrical outlets on top is amazing. And it fits on any nightstand taking only a small amount of space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: R Allred

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it all for that price
customer_reviews.text: Used Alex speaker comparison and Brandstand is like having my old am/fm clock radio next to me. However, it is great to have USB chargers on it. That’s what I think is missing is radio.. just need reminder it’s on my iPhone...
customer_reviews.author: Yoga now and then

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has USB and electrical outlets on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for my position. The hotels I stay in have these exact same clocks. It's simple to use and the speaker is ok. I like that it has USB and electrical outlets on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Tamiami

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm Clock!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very cool! I enjoy it very much. Very easy to use. Love it but would be even better if the charging receptacles and USB were on the sides rather than top. Wish the display was red and dimmed a little more. None the less, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EKH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product rocks! Great for your cell phone (USB power) and laptop. Having AC power on the nightstand is a big plus for my laptop. Dimmable display is nice as well, Bluetooth speaker is simply a bonus. The quality is first rate. I have purchased about 6 of these...
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Jim

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews were correct in that it is difficult to plug in and a pain to have to keep resetting the alarm. These two items are not a deal breaker as we like the functionality and the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We went on vacation and the hotel rooms had it. I knew I had to order it I did the day we left so I can get home to it
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile and convenient product! Great for every room in the house!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw these at a resort I was staying at but without the bluetooth speakers. This prompted me to do a search for them! I ordered 3 of them for my home, one for my own room and the other two for the guest bedrooms! I love them and so do my guests!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton P. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock, alarm is well....alarming!
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock, just wish the alarm feature had some different sounds. I like to wake up gently (who doesn't?!?) and the old school blaring beep isn't gentle...
customer_reviews.author: Renee A. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: I saw this at a hotel and new I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at a hotel and new I had to have it, very high-quality, very well-built and works flawlessly, well worth the $80 purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and price
customer_reviews.text: My husband noticed the CubieBlue on the nightstand when staying in a hotel and we decided to order it for our home. The functionality is great and we can charge our devices conveniently, plus the Bluetooth is handy. It arrived in record time with Prime, of course.
customer_reviews.author: EveryContinent

customer_reviews.title: Dont know what I would do without it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing next to my bed! It always has my charger connected to it and is ready to go and can use it for a back up alarm if needed. Also, have a blue tooth speaker ready to go in my room whenever I wanted. I purchased this for all three of my kids and they all love it!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Met expectation except for sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sturdy clock and has everything needed for modern life. Only complaint is the Bluetooth speaker has poor sound quality. Not bad for audio books but it will not even as good as an Alexa speaker
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: not exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this is that you can't play from your phone or ipad through the USB charging cable, you have to play through bluetooth and this is just an extra step (several extra steps actually) to do at bedtime, as we use our ipad for white noise every night.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Great features, and alarm goes from quiet to loud over time. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: M Ubben

customer_reviews.title: had to have this
customer_reviews.text: I saw this item in a hotel were I stay and I had to buy it. I love it especially the charging ports
customer_reviews.author: becca_valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Although a little pricey, it was a great gift for my teen sons. Work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has USB ports and power supply
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has USB ports and power supply. The blue tooth is amazing. The only thing I don't like is everytime I set the alarm i have to turn the dial over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside clock
customer_reviews.text: First came across this while staying at 2 LaQuinta Inn and Suites. Husband loves its compact size, plus the charging capabilities on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice alarm/bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: For a little bluetooth speaker, it bangs. Easy to use, easy to read, really like it. Cord is 2 gauge, nice and thick. 1 negative is the cord comes up off the plug, so it goes up the wall then down. But all in all a great alarm clock/bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harber

customer_reviews.title: Alarm clock charger
customer_reviews.text: Charging phone mostly. Can also plug other things into it which is what i liked about it. I can also dim the clock numbers way down low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Clock
customer_reviews.text: Stayed in a hotel and this was in room. Had to get one. USB and charger, a big plus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mconrad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for a great price. I can charge my phone easily and it's a wonderful clock and wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good clock
customer_reviews.text: Brought this clock for my master bedroom and like the fact that is has usb ports on top along with outlets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. She was very pleased with sound, display, and ease of use. She had no problems syncing with her i phone and I also have an Android that worked with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Starshine

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt keep good time,
customer_reviews.text: I used it in a hotel like others did, bought one, and the time always needs to be reset, and is hard to change the time,
customer_reviews.author: Pon Bear

customer_reviews.title: Sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Sound was very fuzzy and distorted at even low levels. Clock worked great but that’s not the only reason I bought it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gunnels

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good. The two USB ports are great for charging
customer_reviews.text: I used on at an extended stay hotel. It was very convenient. The sound quality is good. The two USB ports are great for charging. I bought one as soon as I returned home. Best bedside charger/speaker/plug I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: willaim moomaw

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome, I saw it in a hotel
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome, I saw it in a hotel, and immediately ordered one, good alarm, nice snooze button location. i just wish there was an option for the alarm to remain on the same time without resetting everything you turn the alarm on and off. Every day you have to reset the alarm to the time you want.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The unit plugs and USB port works great for charging your Apple devices.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not loud. It does not keep the set alarm time for the next use. Have to set the alarm every night. The time display is not bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets on this buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials. Bluetooth connects quickly. Easy to set up. Clock brightness and clarity is perfect at night/day.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all your charging, good speaker sound, I will be ordering 2 more for different rooms
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: I noticed these at hotels and love them. This is a fancier model with speaker. Sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: All of the functions easy to use very good product
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY J ZARBO

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: Spotted this at a B&B in Calistoga, and placed my order while I was still on my trip. GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.author: Strawgirl

customer_reviews.title: I'm not wowed by the product and I'd have rather purchased a good Bluetooth speaker and a cheap alarm clock instead
customer_reviews.text: The power cord is so heavy duty that you can't turn the clock toward you. Luckily I wake up at 6:40, but the alarm resets to 6AM every time you shut it off. I'm not wowed by the product and I'd have rather purchased a good Bluetooth speaker and a cheap alarm clock instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus McCorckle

customer_reviews.title: Price, easy to read, functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with all the chargeable devices nowadays. Convenient and week made. Correct cord size not cheap junk.

customer_reviews.title: I first saw this clock in a hotel and liked the features it has
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this clock in a hotel and liked the features it has, very nice charging base with an extra heavy duty cord! Easy to see at night!

customer_reviews.text: I do not take the time to write many reviews but when I do the product deserves the highest praise - Thank you for supplying a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Convenient outlets
customer_reviews.text: I love the USB ports and outlets on top. I love that you can dim the light display for the time. I am disappointed that it doesn't keep accurate time. It constantly loses several minutes, even after resetting.

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Saw it at a hotel and was impressed. Got it for my son and he is charging his stuff on it, setting his own alarm and using the speaker at times. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Anybody can connect to the cubie blue using the Bluetooth setting on their device
customer_reviews.text: With work I travel a lot and I used the cubie blue in some on the hotels I stayed in, liked them so much I bought one for my bedroom. They’re easy to use, the sound quality is good and I can charge my phone and headset at the same time plus it has two outlets for any additional uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Brandstand | CubieBlue | User Friendly & Convenient Alarm Clock Charger | 2 USB Ports | 2 Tamper Resistant Sockets | Brandstand Bluetooth Speaker
product_meta.description: CubieBlue combines a simple alarm clock, Bluetooth music play through with the convenience of charging at the nightstand. For Home Use: Switch Single Day Alarm to OFF CubieBlue is the perfect combination with its easy to set alarm, display dimmer, minimal footprint, Bluetooth speaker and user facing power and USB outlets. CubieBlue also features a pass-through plug, surge protection, single day alarm, auto update for daylight saving time, security c-clamp and meets strict UL standards including a UL spill test.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth Speaker – listen to your favorite music
Easy to Use and to Set Alarm Clock – simple one button press and turn design
2 110v Tamper Resistant Power Sockets - built in shutters to prevent foreign objects from being inserted into the outlet
2 USB A Charging Ports – quickly charge all of your devices
Surge Protection – your devices will be protected in the event of an electrical surge (ie., lightning strike)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars512 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
